verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
King of love and grace
My guardian
All my hopes and fears
Are in Your hands
I'm in Your hands

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Where You go I'll go
Show me the way
Every step I take
Be now my guide
God on my side

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You go before me
You're there beside me
And if I wander
Love will find me
Goodness and mercy
Will always follow
You go before me
My Guardian

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When I hear You say
Trust and obey
I will walk by faith
And not by sight
God of my life

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
So let Your kingdom come
Your will be done
All Your promises will stand forever
You're my defender

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are God our great defender
Strong in love forever faithful
We are Yours and we will trust in You
